//The Quiz Map

prontera,161,190,3	script	Mall Of Asia	714,{
	warp "quiz_02" ,295,247;
OnInit:
waitingroom "Mall Of Asia",0,0;
}

//The Exit to Prontera

quiz_02,303,235,4	script	Exit	903,{
	warp "prontera" ,155,177;
}
	
//The Novice Island

novice,48,50,6	script	Exit Map	864,{
	warp "prontera" ,155,177;
}	

//The Vip Room

vip,72,67,6	script	Map Exit	864,{
	warp "prontera" ,155,177;
OnInit:
waitingroom "Exit Map",0,0;
}
